vendor_name: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant and Spa
title: Stylish Stay at Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa
description: If you need a touch of Hamptons glamour and relaxation in your life, look no further: Bells at Killcare Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Spa is the place for you! Forget the rest of the world and unplug from the everyday, with this high-end boutique getaway in a natural paradise. Indulge in daily cooked breakfast made with the freshest produce from the hotel's own garden, a delicious antipasto platter to share, a welcome house cocktail each, and a bottle of sparkling Prosecco on arrival. Top it all off with one AU$50 spa credits per person for a soothing treatment at the tranquil Bells Day Spa and enjoy a late, leisurely check-out at 12pm.
